author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 21-year-old college student was found dead inside the restroom of the private institution where he was studying at Nesapakkam, on Thursday afternoon.

According to police, Prashant, who resides in Saidapet, is a second-year mechanical engineering student in a city college. On Thursday, he collapsed inside a lavatory in the college.

His friend, who had accompanied him to the restroom, raised an alarm. He was rushed to a private hospital where he was declared dead on arrival.

His body has been sent to Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital for a post-mortem examination.

Going by the symptoms, police say they suspect he died of a cardiac arrest. A case of suspicious death has been registered at the K.K. Nagar police station.
title: Student found dead in college bathroom
